data.eml:eml: A contribution to the Heptageniidae (Insecta, Ephemeroptera) of Thailand and Malaysia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Braasch, Dietrich, Boonsoong, Boonsatien (2010): A contribution to the Heptageniidae (Insecta, Ephemeroptera) of Thailand and Malaysia. Zootaxa 2610: 1-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197793
